content: As an AI language model, I don't have perceptions such as finding it difficult or not. However, managing multiple departments within a production division can be a challenging task, as it requires efficient communication, coordination, and project management skills to ensure that all departments work together smoothly and meet their respective deadlines. The management team needs to have a clear vision and ensure that all departments are aligned with the overall objectives and priorities of the production. Effective leadership, delegation, and supervision are critical in ensuring that the show's production is not disrupted and that the final product is of high quality. Nonetheless, with proper planning, coordination, and execution, it is possible to manage multiple departments successfully and produce quality programming.
